title: Decision Tree Example
text: main input data two column data frame tibble edges. must two columns, first column containing node names “” nodes, second containing node names “” nodes. Node names must unique. Optionally, also define additional node attributes. Create flowchart using ggflowchart() function.  Optionally, add styling using {ggplot2} theme() function title using labs() function.
code: goldilocks <- tibble::tibble(from = c("Goldilocks",                               "Porridge", "Porridge", "Porridge",                               "Just right",                               "Chairs", "Chairs", "Chairs",                               "Just right2",                               "Beds", "Beds", "Beds",                               "Just right3"),                      to = c("Porridge",                             "Too cold", "Too hot", "Just right",                             "Chairs",                             "Still too big", "Too big", "Just right2",                             "Beds",                             "Too soft", "Too hard", "Just right3",                             "Bears!")) node_data <- tibble::tibble(name = c("Goldilocks", "Porridge", "Just right", "Chairs",                                      "Just right2", "Beds", "Just right3", "Too cold",                                      "Too hot", "Still too big", "Too big", "Too soft",                                      "Too hard", "Bears!")) %>%   dplyr::mutate(label = gsub("\\d+$", "", name)) ggflowchart(goldilocks, node_data) library(ggplot2) ggflowchart(goldilocks,             node_data,             colour = "#585c45",             text_colour = "#585c45",             arrow_colour = "#585c45") +   scale_x_reverse() +   labs(title = "The Goldilocks Decision Tree") +   theme(plot.background = element_rect(colour = "#f2e4c1", fill = "#f2e4c1"),         plot.title = element_text(size = 20, hjust = 0.5, face = "bold", colour = "#585c45"))

title: Flowcharts with `ggplot2`
text: {ggflowchart} R package producing flowcharts using {ggplot2}.

title: Flowcharts with `ggplot2`
text: Install package using: Note: package currently work--progress. See vignettes usage. Upcoming features: Changing fill colour based node attributes. Changing linetype colour arrows based edge attributes. Support color well colour. Horizontal flowcharts. -level arrows (currently issue crossing ).

title: Add node attributes — add_node_attr
text: Adds additional information node e.g. variable colour

title: Add node attributes — add_node_attr
text: node_layout Data frame node layout returned get_layout(). node_data Data frame tibble node information. Must least one column called "name" node names join . change labels appear nodes, include column name "label".

title: Add node attributes — add_node_attr
text: tibble.

title: Get edges — get_edges
text: Define end points arrows

title: Get edges — get_edges
text: data Data frame tibble edges. Must least two columns, labelled "" "" assumed first column "" node names, second column "" node names. Node names must unique. plot_nodes Tibble node coordinates output get_nodes().

title: Get edges — get_edges
text: tibble.

title: Get layout — get_layout
text: Obtains coordinates nodes flowchart input edges

title: Get layout — get_layout
text: data Data frame tibble edges. Must least two columns, labelled "" "" assumed first column "" node names, second column "" node names. Node names must unique.

title: Get layout — get_layout
text: tibble.

title: Get nodes — get_nodes
text: Define corners nodes.

title: Get nodes — get_nodes
text: node_layout Data frame node layout returned get_layout() x_nudge Distance centre edge node box x direction. Default 0.35. y_nudge Distance centre edge node box y direction. Default 0.25.

title: Get nodes — get_nodes
text: tibble.

what: Generate a flowchart in ggplot2 — ggflowchart
title: Generate a flowchart in ggplot2 — ggflowchart
text: Generates flowchart

title: Generate a flowchart in ggplot2 — ggflowchart
code: ggflowchart(   data,   node_data = NULL,   fill = "white",   colour = "black",   text_colour = "black",   arrow_colour = "black",   family = "sans",   x_nudge = 0.35,   y_nudge = 0.25 )

title: Generate a flowchart in ggplot2 — ggflowchart
text: data Data frame tibble edges. Must two columns, first column "" node names, second column "" node names. Node names must unique. node_data Data frame tibble node information. Must least one column called "name" node names join . Default NULL. fill Fill colour nodes. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "white". colour Outline colour nodes. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "black". text_colour Colour labels nodes. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "black". arrow_colour Colour arrows. Must valid colour name hex code. Default "black". family Font family node labels. Default "sans" x_nudge Distance centre edge node box x direction. Default 0.35. y_nudge Distance centre edge node box y direction. Default 0.25.

title: Generate a flowchart in ggplot2 — ggflowchart
text: ggplot2 object.

title: Generate a flowchart in ggplot2 — ggflowchart
code: data <- tibble::tibble(from = c("A", "A", "A", "B", "C", "F"), to = c("B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "G")) ggflowchart(data)

title: ggflowchart 0.0.1 2022_08_06
text: Initialise package Adds non-exported get_layout() obtain centre node positions Adds non-exported get_nodes() define perimeter node boxes Adds non-exported add_node_attr() include node attributes including labels Adds non-exported get_edges() define arrow start end positions Adds ggflowchart() create flowchart
